MCQ: What is generative artificial intelligence capable of generating?
Choices: a: Text, images, videos, or other data | b: Only text | c: Only images | d: Only videos

MCQ: What enabled an AI boom of generative AI systems in the early 2020s?
Choices: a: Improvements in transformer-based deep neural networks | b: Use of traditional algorithms | c: Lack of funding | d: Decrease in AI research

MCQ: Which company is known for developing chatbots like ChatGPT and Copilot?
Choices: a: Apple | b: OpenAI | c: Amazon | d: Facebook

MCQ: What are some of the industries where generative AI has uses?
Choices: a: Healthcare, finance, entertainment | b: Only healthcare | c: Only finance | d: Only entertainment

MCQ: What are some concerns raised about the potential misuse of generative AI?
Choices: a: Cybercrime, use of fake news or deepfakes | b: Only cybercrime | c: Only use of fake news | d: Only deepfakes
